task.title: Connect to a Running Instance Using the User Console

context.p: In this section of the lab you will use the Eucalyptus User Console to log in to a running instance.

step.cmd: In the User Console in the Manage instances window, click the check box next to your running instance.
Click the More Actions button and then select Connect from the menu.

info.p: The Connect to instance window opens with instructions about how to connect to a running instance.

step.cmd: Read and follow the instructions in the Connect to instance window. Were you able to connect to your instance? Why or why not? You will fix the problem in a later lab exercise.
Click Close in the Connect to instance window.
